title: Old mock drill video from Jharkhand viral as police firing during CAB protests in Assam
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim:
In the view of the protest against the Citizenship Amendment Bill (CAB) in Assam, a video of policemen purportedly firing at a crowd of people is being shared on WhatsApp.

Alt News has received several verification requests for the video on its official mobile application.

This video has been fact-checked by Alt News several times in the past. It is an old clip of a mock drill conducted by Khunti, Jharkhand police. A reverse-search of one of its keyframes led us to the same video uploaded on November 1, 2017, on YouTube.

Alt News had spoken to the owner of a shop – “Jagdamba steel” – visible in the background who confirmed that a mock drill was conducted in the area on October 31, 2017.

This video was earlier shared with varied false claims:
• Police firing at students in Bihar opposing privatisation of Indian railways.

An old video of a mock drill in Jharkhand is thus being shared in the context of CAB protests in Assam.
